title: Try This Ultimate Power Bowl Recipe
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Eggs are an amazing source of protein, loaded with complex carbohydrates that stay with you all day and healthy fats that can do your body some good. Enjoy the benefits of eggs’ power all day long, by trying this simple recipe from Chino Valley Ranchers! It’s good for any meal and easy to prepare. The Ultimate Power Bowl will keep you full, happy and filled with energy for hours to come.

What You’ll Need

  • Chino Valley Ranchers’ eggs
  • Vinegar
  • Olive oil
  • Minced garlic
  • Baby spinach
  • Quinoa (cooked to package’s directions)
  • Crumbled goat cheese
  • Toasted pumpkin seeds

Optional Ingredients

  • Lemon juice
  • Salt and pepper

1. Get your saucepan ready.
Fill saucepan with some water and bring it to a slight simmer while adding vinegar.

2. Poach your eggs. 

Crack your Chino Valley Ranchers’ eggs into a small dish, then transfer them into a saucepan filled with water. Each one will cook separately, for three to five minutes, as the egg whites set and allow them to be poached. Remove the egg with a slotted spoon and let them dry on a paper towel. Repeat this process with each egg.

3. Cook your garlic and spinach.

Heat oil in a skillet set at medium heat. Allow the garlic to cook for at least one minute, then add spinach. Cook the spinach until it looks as though it is about to wilt. Add some salt and pepper to heighten the flavor.

4. Prepare your bowls. 

Add quinoa and lemon juice (if preferred) to remaining olive oil and put each egg into its own bowl. Top them off with spinach, avocado, goat cheese and pumpkin seeds. For some extra flavor, add salt, pepper and other spices.

Use Chino Valley Ranchers’ eggs in your Ultimate Power Bowl to give you the extra strength you need to get through the day!
